backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact submissions and network applications with functions to submit, query all, and fetch entries by email.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend features, their affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router root layout and routes for Home, Services, About, Join Network, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/site/DeletionCon: Modal dialog enabling selection and confirmation of a deletion target, showing a temporary confirmation state without performing deletion.
frontend/src/components/site/PortfolioPr: Placeholder component returning null to disable the portfolio preview section.
frontend/src/components/site/PrimaryButt: Wrapper around shadcn Button providing primary and secondary visual variants with consistent sizing and styling.
Footer with brand text, nationwide messaging, and social links for TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook plus Caffeine attribution.
Responsive site header with navigation links, mobile menu toggling, and a deletion confirmation dialog trigger.
Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, state, and login/logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching contact submissions and network applications using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, global styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the companyâ€™s vision, systems, and mission using structured content sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page that submits inquiries via the backend actor and displays a success message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, nationwide authority messaging, and service highlights, including CTAs for booking and joining the network.
frontend/src/pages/JoinNetworkPage.tsx: Implements the join-network application form with submission handling and a success confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services overview with descriptions, pricing categories, and a hero section emphasizing full-spectrum media production.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme settings, colors, typography, spacing, animations, and plugins for the site.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including design goals, features, architectural notes, and requirements for the Vertex Media marketing site.
